# psidread

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of psidread is to provide a user-friendly approach to streamline the management, creation, and formatting of panel data from the Panel Study of Income Dynamics (PSID).

## Installation

You can install the development version of psidread from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Qcrates/psidread")
```

## Usage

Please refer to the vignettes for the detailed instructions on how to build your own dataset from PSID using this package: [psidread user manual](vignettes/my-vignette.html)
